### Generate a VAT Question

<iframe src ="https://mystruth.shinyapps.io/VAT-Type1/" height=43px width=225px />

```{r Unit2-Type1, echo = FALSE}
knitr::include_app("https://mystruth.shinyapps.io/VAT-Type1/",
                   height = "42px")
```

The file will automatically download when complete.\
Please be patient when generating! - It can take up to 60 seconds per download
